Header: Obama says nuclear terrorist attack would 'change our world'
Content: US President Barack Obama has said that the threat from terrorists trying to launch a nuclear attack that would "change our world" is real. He said that the world has taken "concrete" steps to prevent nuclear terrorism, but the so-called Islamic State obtaining a nuclear weapon is "one of the greatest threats to global security. More than 50 nations were represented at the summit. World leaders convening in Washington for the summit expressed concern about North Korea's nuclear weapons programme and Russia's lack of attendance.
